html: Hi, I wish to inform you that payment for your first assignment would be delivered to you today or tomorrow via USPS priority mail (please be on the look out), the assignment instruction is attached to the payment and don't forget to acknowledge the receipt of the package. Please note: Under no circumstance should you disclose or tell anyone you are a mystery shopper either at the locations or anyone you speak to while conducting the evaluation . Kindly follow instructions as in the memo attached to the check and send your report via email to andy360gibson@aol.com All correspondence (Questions, Survey Report and any Updates) be forwarded to andy360gibson@aol.com Hope to hear from you soon. Regards,
subject: test smtp 54.167.220.143--
text:
Hi, I wish to inform you that payment for your first assignment would be
delivered to you today or tomorrow via USPS priority mail (please be on the look
out), the assignment instruction is attached to the payment and don't forget to
acknowledge the receipt of the package. Please note: Under no circumstance
should you disclose or tell anyone you are a mystery shopper either at the
locations or anyone you speak to while conducting the evaluation . Kindly follow
instructions as in the memo attached to the check and send your report via email
to andy360gibson@aol.com All correspondence (Questions, Survey Report and any
Updates) be forwarded to andy360gibson@aol.com Hope to hear from you soon.
Regards,
